messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-Discussion] Sacramento conference
messages.msgSnippet: **Anybody going to the HSC Conference in Sacramento this weekend?  I know Betsy, Pam S. and Pam H. are.  With me that s 3 Pams.  Anyone else? And can we have
messages.messageBody:
**Anybody going to the HSC Conference in Sacramento this weekend? I
know Betsy, Pam S. and Pam H. are. With me that's 3 Pams. Anyone else?
And can we have an unschooling get together? Maybe past midnight......**

I'd love to get some "hang time" with fellow unschoolers at the
conference.

I'm not at my brightest and loveliest after midnight. <g> The one thing
that I excelled at in school was being the first kid to fall asleep at
every slumber party. What about dinner or after the last session on
Saturday and before dinner?

I plan to go to the "technology" session at 8:30 am Saturday. (Hi,
Dan!) If anyone else is there, please say "hi". I hear the name tag
text is going to be bigger this year, which is great, 'cause it's a
little embarassing to be caught staring at women's chests throughout the
day, even if the reason is trying to decipher their names. (Dan, if you
get "busted", feel free to borrow my "alibi". <eg>)

Betsy, still with the immature jokes!

**I am! With Elizabeth who is not on this list but should be as she
also unschools. We'll be sharing a room. Please look for us.**

Great! Will do so.

messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-Discussion] Sacramento conference
messages.msgSnippet: I am!  With Elizabeth who is not on this list but should be as she also unschools.  We ll be sharing a room.  Please look for us. Joylyn ... [Non-text portions
messages.messageBody:
I am! With Elizabeth who is not on this list but should be as she also
unschools. We'll be sharing a room. Please look for us.

Joylyn

messages.msgSnippet: ... I m just considering Sacramento a warm-up!!!! -pam
messages.messageBody:
On Tuesday, April 8, 2003, at 08:04 AM, kbcdlovejo@... wrote:

>
> The weekend BEFORE SC!
> That's why I plan to pamper Pam. She's going to need it!

I'm just considering Sacramento a warm-up!!!!

messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Sacramento conference
messages.msgSnippet: I don t know if anyone would be interested but CHN is having there first confrence this year in Riverside. June 13, 14, 15. I know Riverside is farther south
messages.messageBody:
I don't know if anyone would be interested but CHN is having there first confrence this year in Riverside. June 13, 14, 15. I know Riverside is farther south than Sac, but I wanted to let you know.
Rebecca
kbcdlovejo@... wrote:In a message dated 4/8/2003 10:55:53 AM Eastern Daylight Time,
zenmomma@... writes:

> When exactly is the Sacramento conference? I keep ignoring it because it
> seems so close to the SC one. But, hell, I can drive to Sacramento from
> Utah. A great teen program and new friends for Conor might make it worth
> it.

The weekend BEFORE SC!
That's why I plan to pamper Pam. She's going to need it!

~Kelly
